messages.title: Three reasons to vote for the local Lib Dems
messages.content: Labour’s support is plummeting across Norfolk. The Lib Dems are the only real alternative to the Tories here. William Summers was born and bred in West Norfolk, and will work hard to represent everybody locally, taking no second jobs or directorships if elected. William supports a more transparent Parliament and an overhaul of the rotten expenses system – unlike the sitting Tory MP who voted AGAINST reform.

messages.title: Change that works for you - The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services. We will put more police on patrol, restore the pensions’ earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces. We can make this pledge because we have identified real savings to pay for it. The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country’s books after the recession.

Restore the pensions’ earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces.

quotes.text: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss.
We’ve lived through this mistake for 60 years now. ... it [the NHS] hasn’t made people healthier.
quotes.source: Senior Conservative MP Dan Hannan, Summer 2009

quotes.text: David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners.
Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS.
